item.title: The ultimate guide to escorted, small-group and independent tours: Best itineraries, tips and more

item.title: Passport stamps to be phased out as Europe launches new border control system
item.description: The Entry/Exit System will use biometric data to register the visits of non-European Union travelers.

item.title: The best credit cards for a diversified reward strategy
